page.title: 16The Elderly in Milnathort.
page.content: {Activities For The Elderly.}49% of the people interviewed (on page 15) take part in activities including Women's Guild,fishing,Antiquarians,bowling, golf,SWRI,church and theatre club. Some of the sample took the minibus on Tuesdays and Thursdays to the Lunch Club at the Kinross Day Centre. Few people in the sample used 'Home Helps' (11%) or 'Meals On Wheels' (8%).Those who used them appreciated them greatly.Those who did not were proud of their independence. (SWRI=Scottish Women's Rural Institute).
